JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Elisabeth Steiner;Julia Laffranque;Khanlar Hajiyev;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Peer Lorenzen
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE and lived until his arrest in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) are represented by PERSON PERSON GPE , ORG at ORG .
CARDINAL . NORP The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the criminal proceedings were initiated against the applicant on suspicion of aggravated kidnapping and aggravated accessory to murder . On DATE he was remanded in custody .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG gave judgment of conviction . The applicant was found guilty of aggravated kidnapping and aggravated accessory to murder and sentenced to DATE imprisonment .
CARDINAL . The applicant and his defence lawyer lodged an appeal . On CARDINAL DATE ORG of GPE upheld the conviction and the sentence in full .
